dataList.name: Struggle
dataList.desc:
Combat Start: gain 8 [Protection]
- Combat Start: if this unit has Low Morale, halve the amount of [Protection] gained
- Combat Start: if this unit is Staggered or Panicked, it does not gain [Protection]

dataList.name: Roar of the Rogue Waves
dataList.desc: When hit, inflict 1 [ColdAirDOQ] against the attacker (once per Skill)

dataList.name: Overlook of All-life
dataList.desc:
When the Passive "Fate's Favored Child" triggers, activate the following:
- Turn End: gain 1 [Binding] next turn
- When hit, inflict 1 [ColdAirDOQ] against the target (once per Skill)

dataList.name: Adversary of the Tides
dataList.desc: When attacking targets with [FreezingDOQ], deal +175% damage

dataList.name: Fate's Favored Child
dataList.desc: When this unit takes damage that brings their HP down to 0, nullify that damage; then, this unit is healed back to 100% HP and SP, and gains a new pattern (once per Encounter)

dataList.name: Rage Against the Waves
dataList.desc: Turn Start: gain 1 [AttackUp] for every enemy with [ColdAirDOQ]

dataList.name: Galloping Rocinante
dataList.desc: Turn Start: if there are 6+ enemies with [ColdAirDOQ], gain 2 [ParryingResultUp]

dataList.name: Nervous Impairment
dataList.desc: This unit's Skills deal +1% damage for every 1 [NervousImpairment] on target

dataList.name: Seaborn
dataList.desc:
Encounter Start: gain 5 [SeaTerrorCell]
Instead of [AttackDown] and [DefenseDown] effects of [SeaTerrorCell], gain [AttackUp] and [DefenseUp]

dataList.name: Call of the Bloodkin
dataList.desc:
Turn End: if there are 2 or fewer surviving allies, consume 10 SP on self to summon 2 "Shell Sea Runner" units to the battlefield

Turn End: if [NetherseaBrandUnit] exists in this Stage, apply 2 [Enhancement] next turn to all Sea Terror units
- Apply 1 [AttackUp] as well for every Stage of [NetherseaBrandUnit]
dataList.summary: If there is [NetherseaBrandUnit] on the field, apply offensive buff next turn to all Sea Terror units

dataList.name: Phototaxic Procession
dataList.desc:
Take -90% damage from [Combustion], [Laceration], [Vibration], [Burst], [Sinking]
Turn Start: gain 10 [Protection]

Turn End: consume [AbyssalVitality] to summon Sea Terror horde
- If there are fewer than 3 Shell Sea Runners or Deep Sea Sliders on the battlefield, randomly summon either of those units until there are a sum of 3 of them next turn and consume (# of summoned units x 4) [AbyssalVitality]
- If Nethersea Founder isn't on the battlefield, consume 8 [AbyssalVitality] to summon it next turn
- If Nethersea Spewer isn't on the battlefield, consume 12 [AbyssalVitality] to summon it next turn
- If Basin Sea Reaper isn't on the battlefield, consume 20 [AbyssalVitality] to summon it next turn

dataList.name: Ego of Responsibility
dataList.desc: Every time a Sea Terror this unit summoned is killed, take fixed HP damage equal to the unit's max HP

dataList.name: Adrift Compassion
dataList.desc:
At 50%- HP, immediately ends combat phase and gains a new pattern
- Disable the Phototaxic Procession Passive
- Gain 100 [AbyssalVitality]
- When gaining this Passive, or when recovering from Stagger, gain Shield equal to the amount of HP lost (once per turn)
- When gaining Shield, activate the effects of [IndelibleGoodwill]

Turn Start:
- Apply 5 [NervousImpairment] to all enemies with less than 15 [NervousImpairment]
- Gain [Vulnerable] equal to double the number of times ("Before the compassion they believe in loses its worth.") was used during this Encounter. (max 6)

After gaining a new pattern: reduce this unit's Skill Slots by the number of Staggered enemies every turn (by 6 max; does not apply to turns when this unit uses a powerful Skill)

dataList.name: Nethersea Brand Utopia
dataList.desc: When on top of [NetherseaBrandUnit]: gain Final Power +3 and Coin Power +3, and double the amount of [NervousImpairment] inflicted On Hit

dataList.name: Coaxing Kins
dataList.desc: When hitting a Basin Sea Reaper with this unit's Skill, convert it from [WaitingforCommandMod] to [ParticipationMod]

dataList.name: Cell Membrane
dataList.desc: If this unit has remaining Shield after getting hit, inflict 2 [Sinking] against the target
